item.content:
My first love ended in a mere ten pages..

Today, my sister told me that my crush is going to stay for a while in our residence with a girl

At first, I thought it was his sister since her name is the same as Nasa-kun

But suddenly my Mom said it was her wife & Nasa-kun had been married several couple days ago

And there is my another gloomy day after my first love ended tragically
